article_title: UnitedHealth's Optum Boosts Profits As Obamacare Demands Population Health

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: UnitedHealth Group (UNH), the nation’s largest health insurance company, continues to add more customers across all of its businesses while offering hospitals and health systems more services to manage populations of patients through its fast-growing Optum business. UnitedHealth’s revenues soared 27% in the third quarter, or by $8.7 billion, to $41.5 [...]
